mapper.insert: insert into daum_review( movie_id, writer, rate, content, regtime ) select #{movieId}, #{writer}, #{rate}, #{content}, #{regtime} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT movie_id, writer, rate, content, regtime FROM daum_review WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND writer = #{writer} AND regtime = #{regtime} )
mapper.select: select * from daum_review where movie_id = #{movieId} and rate >= 6
select * from daum_review where movie_id = #{movieId} and rate between 0 and 5
select * from daum_review where movie_id = #{movieId} and writer = #{writer}
